name: lore-monorepo
author: Storcery
description: This is the monorepo for Lore (A Convention driven framework for React + Redux applications)

scripts.check: npm run lint && npm run test
scripts.clean:node: npm run clean:node:local && npm run clean:node:lore && npm run clean:node:lore-cli
scripts.clean:all: npm run clean && npm run clean:node
scripts.postinstall: npm run install:lore && npm run install:lore-cli
scripts.test: npm run test:lore && npm run test:lore-cli
